name: Great Balls of Death
description:
My first Unity project made at school. We had to make a game for two players, with a fixed camera and a victory condition. The game is not really awesome, but it has a cool soundtrack. Also, it's pretty easy to win or « not to lose » if you think about it.

In this game, you have to push the other player ball into the void and win after he or she fell five times.

That's it.
